message.body: I just sent you an email. Imagine that my eyes were twinkling went I wrote it. I meant to add: "I have faith in you, Gabi".

I wish that I could give you the entire history of the cabaret and all of the trials and errors. I'm a little scarred, a little conservative as a result. You ruffle my feathers, Gabi, and I kind of like it.
I dont think youre too fussy, high standards are important. Ps i just talked to a relative who said burlington has the best chinese food in the country, referring to single pebble of course

Thanks. I expect that you'll tell me if you think I'm being unreasonable.
The pebble was recently featured in an article that reviewed, I think, 50 Chinese restaurants across the country. We were in the top 10.
